Mumbai vs Bangalore Head to Head Stats

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.14.5″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.14.5″ text_font=”Coda||||||||” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_layout=”dark” max_width=”800px” max_width_tablet=”800px” max_width_phone=”800px” max_width_last_edited=”on|desktop” module_alignment=”center” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”14px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

The famous rivalry between the Mumbai and Bangalore teams is one of the most sought-after ones in the entirety of the Indian T20 League. Every year, millions of viewers watch the league to keep track of both the teams’ positions on the leaderboard.

The Mumbai team is the most expensive in the history of the Indian T-20 League. The lineup consists of star players from all around the world who consistently show results on the pitch. The team receives coaching from cricket legends Shane Bond and Mahela Jayawardene, both world-class athletes from their era.

On the other hand, the Bangalore team has never won a single Indian T-20 League title. They have featured in multiple league finals, just to be beaten by their opponents in each one of them. Since the team houses many star players like Virat Kohli and Glenn Maxwell on retainer, their consistent lack of good results year-after-year has given them the tag of the “Underachievers”. The team coach is Sanjay Bangar, an ex-professional cricket legend, having a lot of experience coaching other star-studded rosters in the past.

Mumbai vs Bangalore- Head to Head Record

The Mumbai VS Bangalore rivalry is a substantial motivating factor for players on both teams to always bring their best to the pitch whenever the two giants go against each other. Statistically, the Mumbai team takes the lead due to outstanding performance in previous matches. Out of the 31 games where the two went head-to-head, the Mumbai team has won 19 games, whereas the Bangalore team has won only 12.

Know More About Mumbai and Bangalore Teams

The Mumbai team has been dominating the Indian T-20 League in recent years. In recent years, the team has beaten almost all its competitors by astronomical margins and won 5 titles in the last eight years. All of this has happened under the captaincy of the living legend Rohit Sharma, who is currently the Indian National Team captain.

On the other hand, the Bangalore team is led by the ex-skipper of the Indian National Team, Virat Kohli, who is a star batsman for the country and Bangalore. The Bangalore team is popularly known as the most cursed team in the history of the Indian T-20 League because of their consistent underperformance despite having more talent on board than most of their competitors.

Bangalore won the toss in the last match that the two teams played against each other and chose to bowl first. The Bangalore team somehow managed to restrict the defending champions (Mumbai) to a humble score of 159/9. With the skipper, Virat Kohli, star players Glenn Maxwell, and AB de Villiers showing us some top-class batting, Bangalore won the match in the very last ball of the game. As the Bangalore team won the match by a hair, the excitement amongst Mumbai VS Bangalore followers has multiplied ever since. Supporters of both teams are eager to watch them go head-to-head again in the upcoming Indian T-20 League season.

Top Performers In Batting- Mumbai vs Bangalore

Both the teams have exceptional batters lining their rosters to outclass all competition. Here are the top batting performers for both teams: [/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.14.5″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Coda||||||||” text_text_color=”#dddddd” text_font_size=”16px” header_4_font=”Nova Flat||||||||” header_4_text_color=”#FC575E” header_4_font_size=”24px” header_4_line_height=”1.8em” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Most Runs

Virat Kohli, captain of Bangalore, has is the star batsman from the team with the highest runs (721). AB de Villiers holds the 2nd position with his stellar performance and has a run score of 693. Chris Gayle has been a talisman for Bangalore and has a record of 375 runs.

While from Mumbai, KA Pollard is at the top of the leaderboard with 551 runs. The captain of Mumbai, Rohit Sharma, comes just second to this with 510 runs. Ambati Rayudu has played exceptionally well being a part of the Mumbai franchise and has a run record of 406.

Highest Scores

● Ishan Kishan- 99 (Mumbai)
● AB de Villiers- 133 (Bangalore)[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Roster” _builder_version=”4.14.5″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”#121a25″ background_color_gradient_end=”#002e54″ background_image=”http://www.my11circle.com/fantasy-sports/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/cricket-icon-04.png” background_size=”contain” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.14.5″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.14.5″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.14.5″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Coda||||||||” text_text_color=”#dddddd” text_font_size=”16px” header_3_font=”Nova Flat||||||||” header_3_text_align=”center” header_3_text_color=”#fc575e” header_3_font_size=”28px” header_3_line_height=”1.7em” text_orientation=”center” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Top Performers In Bowling- Mumbai vs Bangalore

Both the rivals have spent large sums of money to make it hard for opponents to score against them. Here are the top bowling performers for both teams:[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.14.5″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Coda||||||||” text_text_color=”#dddddd” text_font_size=”16px” header_4_font=”Nova Flat||||||||” header_4_text_color=”#FC575E” header_4_font_size=”24px” header_4_line_height=”1.8em” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Top Wicket Scorers

Yuzvendra Chahal has taken a record number of wickets (22) from Bangalore, which remains unbeaten. Harshal Patel comes next with a blazing 15 wickets.

From Mumbai, JaspritBumrah is at the top with an unbeaten 24 wickets. Harbhajan Singh has scored 18 wickets which remains the second-highest to date.

Best Bowling

Samuel Badree has the best bowling figures from Bangalore, with a remarkable record of 4/9. Whereas from Mumbai, CRD Fernando has the cleanest bowling figures (4/18) against Bangalore.[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.14.5″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#0C101B” background_color_gradient_start=”#002e54″ background_color_gradient_end=”#121a25″ background_image=”http://www.my11circle.com/fantasy-sports/wp-content/uploads/2022/02/esports-icon-2-4.png” background_size=”initial” background_blend=”overlay” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.14.5″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.14.5″ _module_preset=”default” background_enable_image=”off” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.14.5″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Coda||||||||” text_font_size=”16px” header_3_font=”Nova Flat||||||||” header_3_text_align=”center” header_3_text_color=”#fc575e” header_3_font_size=”24px” header_3_line_height=”1.8em” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” custom_padding=”||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Team Mumbai

Rohit Sharma, Ishan Kishan, Kieron Pollard, Suryakumar Yadav, Tilak Verma, Sanjay Yadav, Tim David, JaspritBumrah, Murugan Ashwin, Daniel Sams, and Tymal Mills.

Tips For Picking Your Fantasy Team

Now that you are well-informed about all the intricate details in the Mumbai VS Bangalore rivalry, here are some tips to help you pick your team with My11Circle:

  • Check recent player performance and news about injuries or other life-altering events.
  • Choose a capable captain and vice-captain for your dream squad.
  • Choose the 3 best batters of the team to bat first.
  • Check the toss results and make last-minute changes if necessary.
  • Create multiple teams to increase your chances of winning.
